page.title: 13FLORA AND FAUNA
page.content: AROUND{LANGHOLM}YOU CAN SEE LOTS OF DIFFERENT KINDS OF{PLANTS, ANIMALS}AND {BIRDS}.MOST OF THE WOODS ARE CONIFERS BUT THERE ARE ALSO LOTS OF{DECIDIOUS TREES.THE AUTUMN LEAF COLOURS LOOK BEAUTIFUL.ON THE HILLS YOU GET {HEATHER,BRACKEN}AND{BILBERRIES.}BY THE RIVER YOU FIND{MARIGOLDS}AND AVENS.THERE IS A GOOD SHOW OF WILD FLOWERS THROUGHOUT THE YEAR.IN THE GARDENS YOU SEE{BLACKBIRDS,ROBINS}AND {THRUSHES}.AT THE RIVER YOU SEE{HERONS OR{KINGFISHERS}IF YOU ARE LUCKY.YOU MIGHT GLIMPSE A {JAY}IN THE{WOODS . THERE IS A WIDE RANGE OF WILD CREATURES LIKE{HARE, ADDER {GRASSSNAKE, FOX, STOAT, WEASEL, ROE {DEER}AND{HEDGEHOG}.ANYONE INTERESTED IN NATURE CAN SEE A WIDE RANGE ON OUR HILLS,RIVERS AND WOODS.
